Comment: These words spoken by the angel - "He is not here; he has risen, just as he said" - are the most comforting words ever spoken by anyone other than our Lord Himself. Announcing that He has kept His word through this most extraordinary sign gives us the assurance that He will keep His word for us. He is risen, just as He said. Our sins are forgiven, just as He said. We will rise from the dead at His coming, just as He said. Alleluia, Christ is risen.
